data.title: Babyface
data.text:
BABYFACE SET TO RECEIVE THE BMI ICON AWARD AT THE 2024 BMI R&B/Hip Hop Awards

13-time GRAMMY winner Babyface will be honored with the BMI Icon Award at the 2024 BMI R&B/Hip-Hop Awards on 9/5, celebrating his timeless hits and impact across the music industry. Read more.

Read more

Babyface Inducted Into The Apollo Walk Of Fame

13x Grammy Award-winning singer-songwriter Babyface was inducted into The Apollo Walk of Fame and honored with The Apollo’s inaugural Legacy Award. “Today’s theme is no one gets here by themselves. Nobody does it alone. Today, this is what ‘making it’ means.” – Babyface

Read more

Variety: Babyface to Play Three Weekends at the Pearl Concert Theater in Las Vegas

Babyface will return to the Pearl Concert Theater at Palms Casino Resort in Las Vegas over three weekends this year. The shows will be held over Memorial Day weekend on Saturday, May 25 and Sunday, May 26; Labor Day weekend on Saturday, Aug. 31 and Sunday, Sept. 1; and Friday, Nov. 8 and Saturday, Nov. 9, […]

Read more

Babyface Brings Music Education To 20 Indianapolis Schools With Nonprofit Music Will

Babyface chats with Kelly Clarkson on going back to his hometown of Indianapolis with the Music Will nonprofit to bring the gift of music education to 20 new schools. Watch the full interview below.

Read more

BABYFACE LIVE IN LAS VEGAS

Babyface is set to perform in Las Vegas for six special nights, May 25 & 26, August 31 & September 1, November 8 & 9 at the Pearl Concert Theater at the Palms Casino Resort Las Vegas. Pre-sale starts this Tuesday, 2/27 at 10am PT with code BABYFACE. Tickets on sale Friday, 3/1 at 10am […]

Read more

Babyface Performs the National Anthem at 2024 NBA All-Star Game

Babyface performed the National Anthem at the 2024 NBA All-Star Game in his hometown of Indianapolis, IN. Read more and watch the full performance below.

Read more

Babyface Wins 13th GRAMMY Award for Best R&B Song “Snooze” by SZA

Babyface won his 13th GRAMMY Award for Best R&B Song for “Snooze” by SZA at the 2024 GRAMMY Awards. Babyface received nominations in two other categories: Best R&B Album (Girls Night Out,) Best Traditional R&B Performance (“Simple” by Babyface & Coco Jones off his Girls Night Out album.)

Read more

Babyface Nominated for Three GRAMMY Awards

Babyface has received three GRAMMY Award nominations for Best R&B Album with Girls Night Out, Best Traditional R&B Performance for his single “Simple” with Coco Jones, and SZA’s song “Snooze,” which was nominated for Best R&B Song. He now holds 83 GRAMMY Award nominations. He also wrote, produced, and was featured on Diddy’s GRAMMY nominated Love Album for Best […]

Read more

Babyface Nominated For Two BET Soul Train Awards

Babyface has received two BET Soul Train Award nominations for Best R&B/Soul Male Artist and Album of the Year for his album “Girls Night Out.”

Read more

The Source: Babyface Electrifies Crowd at The Palms Hotel in Las Vegas

“Over the weekend, Las Vegas’ renowned Palms Hotel was treated to a night of unforgettable music and nostalgia courtesy of the incomparable Babyface. The 12-time Grammy-winning and platinum-selling artist graced the stage with an electrifying presence, showcasing his endless catalog of hits.” -The Source Click here to read more at TheSource.com.

Read more

GQ: Babyface Is Back Outside

“The prolific R&B legend has been everywhere lately, with credits on SZA’s “Snooze”and Diddy’s Kim Porter tribute, plus a new chart-topper of his own.” -GQ Click here to read more on GQ.com.

Read more

Rated R&B: Babyface’s ‘As a Matter of Fact’ Logs Fifth Week at No. 1 on Billboard

“Babyface remains on a lucky streak. His latest single “As a Matter of Fact” has entered its fifth week atop Billboard’s Adult R&B Airplay chart.” -Rated R&B This is Babyface’s longest run at No. 1 on this chart and his first song on the Adult R&B chart in 26 years. Click here to read more […]

Read more

Billboard: Babyface’s ‘Fact’ Finds No. 1 on Adult R&B Airplay

“For the first time in 26 years, Babyface rules Billboard’s Adult R&B Airplay chart without any other credited artists, with “As a matter of fact” […]” -Billboard Click here to read more on Billboard.com.

Read more

Babyface’s “As a matter of fact” Hits #1 On Billboard’s Adult R&B Chart

Babyface’s song “As a matter of fact” is now #1 on Billboard’s Adult R&B Airplay Chart, giving him his first number one hit as a solo artist in 26 years! Click to read more and to listen on all streaming platforms.

Read more

Babyface was honored with the Icon Award at the 2023 Hollywood Unlocked Impact Awards. See more photos here.

Babyface Performs NPR Tiny Desk Concert

Babyface took the Tiny Desk stage for NPR’s Black Music Month celebration with a performance of hits he’s written and produced, joined by Tank, Chanté Moore, and Avery Wilson. Watch the full concert below:

Babyface’s “As a matter of fact” Hits Top 10 On Billboard’s Adult R&B Airplay Chart

Babyface’s song “As a matter of fact” is now Top 10 on Billboard’s Adult R&B Airplay Chart. Click here to listen now on all streaming platforms!

Babyface Honored at Music Will’s 2023 Benefit Gala

Babyface was honored at the 2023 Music Will benefit gala alongside Idina Menzel and Tom Morello. Music Will will be launching music programs in 20 schools in Babyface’s hometown of Indianapolis.

Babyface to Be Honored at Music Will’s 2023 Benefit Gala Alongside Idina Menzel & Tom Morello

Babyface will be honored at Music Will’s annual benefit on May 2 at the Novo in Los Angeles, alongside Idina Menzel and Tom Morello. Each of the honorees will aid non-profit music education programs in local schools across America. Read more here.
